main_definition: Yea is an informal affirmation, agreement or approval often used in conversational English.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A casual way to say 'yes' or express agreement.
meanings_and_examples.example: Do you want to go for a walk? - Yea!

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used in legal contexts as part of the phrase 'I, [Name], do hereby agree/affirm', similar to the formal wording used in contract signing.
meanings_and_examples.example: Yea, I, John Smith, do hereby sign this agreement.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A colloquial expression of approval or consent often associated with traditional Irish and Scottish culture.
meanings_and_examples.example: He gave a hearty 'yea' to the idea of having a party at his house.
